name: girt
description:
please comment if you find any glitches / bugs or have any game ideas :)

your goal is to place as much grass as possible, placing grass costs money

you get money every round but dirt grows every round (space for next round)

grass cant be placed on dirt

controls / more info in-game

- forest / city skin can cause extra lag

Currently Know Bugs:

- cant see grass with Forest skin
